official_title: To repeal the Department of Agriculture bioenergy subsidy programs and other related subsidy programs.
short_title: Farewell to Unnecessary Energy Lifelines Reform Act of 2023

summary.text:
Farewell to Unnecessary Energy Lifelines Reform Act of 2023 or the FUEL Reform Act 

This bill repeals Title IX (Energy) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002. The title authorizes various energy programs that are administered by the Department of Agriculture and primarily provide support and incentives for renewable energy projects.

titles.title: Farewell to Unnecessary Energy Lifelines Reform Act of 2023
To repeal the Department of Agriculture bioenergy subsidy programs and other related subsidy programs.
